title: Most Representative Cigar from Each Country - The After Show
itunes:title: Most Representative Cigar from Each Country - The After Show
description:
We are looking for one cigar from each cigar producing country that best represents the flavors of that country. With four different opinions, it seems unlikely that we’ll get any consensus.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
